name: LALS 194T
title: Youth and Citizenship
description: Explores multiple and contested meanings of youth and citizenship; how youth, civic, and political identities are imagined, produced and negotiated in social and cultural locations; and how different versions of Latina/o youth citizenship are promoted and articulated by social and political institutions.

pre_req_data.text: Enrollment is restricted to junior and senior Latin American and Latino studies majors, minors, and combined majors.

class_notes: Enroll in associate seminar lab: LALS 194L
